property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Prerequisite
property.value: COMPUTER 5+ or SCIENCES 5+

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Why is your house much nicer than mine?" - Mulder

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on Agent Skinner. While Skinner is in the Field, he gains +1 RES and +1 LRC. Each player may have only one of this card in play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I was following orders, doing what my superiors commanded me to do. I'm not saying it's right. It's not. And I lived with the guilt of that decision every moment since." - Skinner

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: FBI Agent Colquitt is responsible for managing prisoner transport and security, ensuring smooth transitions during transfers. He is involved when Scully arranges for Mulder to be escorted into a prison while handcuffed as part of a covert operation to infiltrate the facility.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 RP

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on Miller's card. Discard a token to move Agent Miller from any Section to any other Section immediately, unless an Adversary has forced Combat. In that case, the movement occurs after the Combat is resolved. The Agent may join any Team in the new Section.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Kyd Miller, an open-minded FBI Agent, aids Mulder and Scully in decoding mysteries involving terrorists, brainwave communication, and global conspiracies, while opposing the Cigarette Smoking Man.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 RP

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Agent Liz Einstein. Discard a token to discard up to two cards. For each card discarded, apply a +1 modifier to one of her skills (your choice) during a Site skill check performed by the Team she belongs to.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Kyd Miller, an open-minded FBI Agent, aids Mulder and Scully in decoding mysteries involving terrorists, brainwave communication, and global conspiracies, while opposing the Cigarette Smoking Man.

property.name: Episode
property.value: Founder's Mutation

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 RP

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Agent Murphy. Once per turn, you may discard one token to force your opponent to remove one card (their choice) from their hand from the game.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Murphy is a Department of Defense official tasked with overseeing classified projects, including genetic experiments like those in Founder's Mutation. Calculating and secretive, he safeguards government agendas at any cost.

property.name: Episode
property.value: The Lost Art of Forehead Sweat

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after incorrectly guessing the identity of your opponent's X-File. You may ask one additional question about the same Characteristic (e.g., RESULT)'. Each player may have only one of this card in their deck. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They gave us all the answers to everything! Even Sasquatch. No! It's not true!" - Mulder

card.name: Arlington National Cemetery, Arlington County, Virginia

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Prerequisite
property.value: BUREAUCRACY 5+ or SUBTERFUGE 5+

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I was at Langly's. At the Lone Gunmen's Burial in the Arlington Cemetery." - Scully

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: This Adversary fights only in LONG RANGE COMBAT rounds. Agents must add their COMPUTER skill to their LRC value (e.g. a COMPUTER skill of 2 and an LRC skill of 1 results in an LRC of 3). Continue LONG RANGE COMBAT rounds until all Agents are defeated or the Adversary's HEALTH reaches zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Hey, kid. Fly this out of my face, or you'll end up with nothing in your hand but a joystick." - Mulder

property.name: Episode
property.value: Nothing Lasts Forever

property.name: Cost
property.value: 6 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT is skipped. When Barbara Beaumont enters play, place one damage token on each Agent in the attacking Team. At the end of each Combat round, after damage has been assigned, Barbara Beaumont heals two damage tokens for each Agent defeated that round, but only if her HEALTH is still above 0.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Whenever eats my flesh and drinks my blood, has eternal life...

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Event|Alien Investigation

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after one of your Teams successfully investigated a Site with Alien Investigation skill as a prerequisite. Add 7 [RP] to your pool.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Advanced extraterrestrial species visiting us, concerned for mankind and the threat of our self-destruction, forestalling or annihilation through their own self-sacrifice. The crashes at Roswell. " - Mulder

property.name: Cost
property.value: 8 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Damage caused by this Adversary may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice). This Adversary may use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Ain't you heard FBI, Mulder? You're on our side now." - Commander Al

property.name: Episode
property.value: Home Again

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 RP

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place three tokens on Detective Aaron Dross. Once per turn, as the Active Player, you may remove a token to discard a card and draw two from your Bureau deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Detective Aaron Dross is a local law enforcement officer who reaches out to FBI for help with an unsettling case. Tasked with investigating eerie, unexplained events, he relies on Mulder and Scully's expertise in the paranormal to uncover the truth.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place three tokens on Detective Costa. You may remove one token per turn to add +1 to his OBSERVATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills during a skill check he participates in.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Detective Costa is a police detective who assists Mulder and Scully during the investigation of the Ghouli case. He provides crucial information, including details about the mysterious 911 call and the victim's connection to a figure named Ghouli.

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (I)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 6 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's MEDICAL and SCIENCES skills. You cannot sell this card during the Briefing phase to gain [CP] points.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I don't believe this. There's nothing. There's no alien DNA. I saw it when I sequenced my genome. It was near the centromere on cromosome 17."- Scully

property.name: Episode
property.value: Plus One

property.name: Cost
property.value: 6 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: This Adversary is an exact copy of any Agent card in the Team investigating this Site (your choice) and will engage in Combat only with that Agent. Follow normal Combat rules until one of the Agents (or both) reaches a HEALTH value of zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "My rational mind knows that you are only... a manifest psychic ideation borne of latent hostility." - Scully

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to SCIENCES 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I am searching for the key that was the seed to all of these terrible genetic abnormalities." - Dr. Augustus Goldman

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to COMPUTER 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They scanned and copied the salient features of our biological brain. They uploaded us into a simulation." - Dr. Karah Hamby

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to BUREAUCRACY 3+. Your opponent may pay 3 [CP] to negate this Witness.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Life on this Earth, all human life, most animal life, is about to be crushed." - Erika Price

property.name: Episode
property.value: The Lost Art of Forehead Sweat

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard this card to add two to any of the Agent's skills. You can have only one of this card in your deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: But every time I look for Goop-O A-B-C, everyone says... No, you must be thinking about Jell-O 1-2-3."- Scully

property.name: Episode
property.value: Mulder and Scully Meet the Were-Monster

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to SUBTERFUGE 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I was myself again. And everything was fine... until the next morning." - Guy Mann

property.name: Episode
property.value: Founder's Mutation

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: The High Frequency Wave is unaffected by Combat attacks. It will attack once in one LONG RANGE COMBAT round and one CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round, then it is discarded.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It was a high-pitched frequency like - like a steel spike being driven through my head." - Mulder

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (III)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 CP

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bluff|Alien Manipulation|Resource

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in the Team investigating this Site. Each time this Agent contributes to a skill check, you must place a damage token on them. Remove this card when the Agent is sent to the Hospital with zero HEALTH. Only one of this card may be in play at a time.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This faith in technology our new religion... When a simple pathogen would kill billions and billions." - Carl Gerhard Busch

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in Combat. The Kitten's Revenge may use SUBTERFUGE cards. If he attacks Assistant Director Walter Skinner, LRC is skipped.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Imagine the power of a government that could literally control the minds... of millions of citizens." - Davey James

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Force up to two face-down Bluff cards attached to one or different Sites to be discarded .

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mulder, it's like I designed heaven. I eat hot dogs and donuts all day long. No one here ever dies of cancer or Alzheimer's. And the Ramones are here, and they don't fight." - Langly

property.name: Cost
property.value: 6 CP

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's a mix of Canis Latras and Canis Lupus. It's a hybrid coyote-wolf." - Mulder

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Decrease all of the skills levels on one Agent (your choice) by 2 for this turn only. Then, regardless of whether the Site Prerequisite is met or not, move the Agent to the Hospital with one damage token.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Dude, I was on fire!." - Mulder

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play Mr. Chuckleteeth, your opponent must choose two Agents. Send all other Agents are sent to the Hospital with zero HEALTH. Then, discard this Adversary.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mr. Chuckleteeth, Happy as can be. Mister Chuckleteeth, won't you play with me. When I'm feeling lonely, lonely as can be, Oh, Mister Chuckleteeth, won't you play with me." - Mulder

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Mr. Green may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards. Each Agent wounded by Mr. Green may not contribute to any skill check this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "My parents were killed by those men on the street. They're hunting me now." - William

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (III)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 8 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT is skipped. This Adversary may attack a Team of Agents in the Bureau. During the Combat, the Bureau is considered to have a single Characteristic SITE Keyword. You may choose any one (e.g., RESULT SITE) and play this Adversary in the Bureau instead, following the usual Combat rules.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Tha man they just wheeled out on a gurney... I know that man." - Mulder

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (IV)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a MULTI Site card. If the Team successfully investigates the Site after meeting the Site Prerequisite, you may choose the type of question your opponent may ask from the options listed on the Site card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You can't keep this secret for long." - Mr. Y

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Prerequisite
property.value: BUREAUCRACY 3+ and SCIENCES 3+

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE, one METHOD or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Well, the sheriff here in Mud Lick says he's got a body in the morgue minus an ear." - Mulder

property.name: Episode
property.value: Plus One

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: For the remainder of this turn, a Site in the Field (your choice) is considered to have a single Characteristic Characteristic SITE Keyword. You may choose any one Characteristic for the Keyword (i.e., RESULT SITE).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Judy! Open the door!" - Scully

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on your opponent's Field. If your opponent plays an Agent or Witness card from their hand, that card is abducted and placed under this one. On their next turn, your opponent may play the abducted card as usual at no cost. Then, discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Please, don't quit! No!" - Sveta Zatylny

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Site|Multi|Method|Result|Evidence Collection|Observation

property.name: Prerequisite
property.value: EVIDENCE COLLECTION 5+ or OBSERVATION 5+

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions. That's a quote form Edgar Cayce. He was called the Sleeping Prophet." - Mulder

property.name: Episode
property.value: Mulder and Scully Meet the Were-Monster

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after a Witness card is played. Double the skill value provided by the Witness for the current skill check (i.e.: a Witness with COMPUTER +2 becomes COMPUTER +4).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "You made that up."Guy Man:All right, you got me. Ever since I became a human, I can't help but lie about my sex life."

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, choose one Adversary Keyword (i.e.: ALIEN). Adversaries with chosen Keyword may not deal any damage to this Agent. If the Agent is the only eligible target, the damage is halved.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mom, I'm here. Come back to us. Mom?."- Scully

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (II)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team investigating this Site successfully meets the Site Prerequisite, you must reveal one of your X-File's characteristics to your opponent (their choice), and your opponent must reveal the same characteristic to you. Remove this card from play. You may only have one of this card in your deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I thought that you were dead." - Monica Reyes

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle

property.name: Cost
property.value: 6 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Briefing phase. Force the Active player to remove one [RP] card already in play with the Keyword SITE, EQUIPMENT or RESOURCE from their side of the game (their choice). Then, search your opponent Discard Pile and remove one card of your choice from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Damn thing could be dangerous." - Man in black

property.name: Episode
property.value: Founder's Mutation

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Prerequisite
property.value: BUREAUCRACY 5+ or SCIENCES 5+

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The government. Augustus worked for them. I couldn't trust anyone. Especially the police. I was so scared. I was going too fast." - Mrs. Goldman

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to OBSERVATION 3+. Your opponent may pay 3 [CP] to negate this Witness.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The camera is motion activated... so it should take terribly long to find what we're looking for." - Sheriff Mac Stenzler

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (II)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: You play an Agent card from your hand at no cost (tokens included). The Agent cannot investigate any Site, but you may use their game effect. At the end of your turn, remove this card and the Agent from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I wish this were under better circumstances, but I wish a lot of things were different here today." - Monica Reyes

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard this card to search through your Bureau deck for a Witness card. Shuffle your deck, and immediately play the Witness card at no cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Scully, listen to me. I've been misled. We've been misled."- Mulder

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Witness|Alien Investigation

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check. Your opponent may pay 3 [CP] to negate this Witness.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Tad O'Malley tried to put words in my mouth. He paid me to create stories about alien abductions." - Sveta Zatylny

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 RP

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Witness|Alien Investigation|Bureaucracy

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or adds 2 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A government that taps your phone, collects your data and monitors your whereabouts with impunity. A government preparing to use that data against you when it strikes, and the final takeover begins." - Tad O'Malley

property.name: Episode
property.value: Home Again

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. This Adversary can only attack Teams that consist of a single Agent, including Teams that originally had more Agents but were reduced to one after a Combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "And did you smell it? It smells like nothing on this Earth." - The Trashman

property.name: Episode
property.value: The Lost Art of Forehead Sweat

property.name: Text
property.value: When a team of Agents contributes to a single skill check this turn, they use the following swapped skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION ↔ BUREAUCRACY, BEHAVIORAL ↔ OCCULT INVESTIGATION, COMPUTER ↔ SCIENCES, OBSERVATION ↔ MEDICAL. If a skill is missing, its value is 0. Remove this card from play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "No, it's called the Mengele Effect." - Reggie Something

property.name: Cost
property.value: 4 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to examine your opponent's hand. Select one Active card. If your opponent plays that card this turn, subtract 4 points from their Team's Site skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The AI would learn from humans. It was constructed to become progressively more intelligent."

property.name: Episode
property.value: My Struggle (III)

property.name: Cost
property.value: 6 CP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to force the investigating player to discard their entire hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That's how heroes are made.!" - Carl Gerhard Busch

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to allow Assistant Director Walter Skinner to leave the Bureau and join any Team in the Field, unless an Adversary has already forced combat. During your Debriefing Phase, if Skinner remains in the Field, you may move him back to the Bureau.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm gonna ask you once and only once. Where is he?" - Kersh

card.name: You see what I want you to see

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 RP

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard two cards at random from your hand to negate any [CP] card played by your opponent. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's a false reality, Scully. Just like everything we've seen so far.'" - Mulder
